Desc.entry: Provides a safe inclusive environment for young people with learning disabilities in Sheffield. Open to any teenager with a disability. Current service users range from those with mild learning disabilities to severe autism. Aims to empower service users and help to build confidence by organising trips and activities each session. These include cinema trips and educational workshops such as pampering sessions and money management. Activities are generally held on a Saturday. Company limited by guarantee no 07251898.
